{{cpp/container/array/title|fill}}
{{cpp/container/array/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|notes={{mark constexpr since c++20}}|
void fill( const T&amp; value );
}}

Assigns the {{c|value}} to all elements in the container.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|value|the value to assign to the elements}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Complexity===
Linear in the size of the container.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;array&gt;
#include &lt;cstddef&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::size_t xy = 4;

    using Cell = std::array&lt;unsigned char, 8&gt;;

    std::array&lt;Cell, xy * xy&gt; board;

    board.fill({0xE2, 0x96, 0x84, 0xE2, 0x96, 0x80, 0, 0}); // "▄▀";

    for (std::size_t count{}; Cell c : board)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; c.data() &lt;&lt; ((++count % xy) ? "" : "\n");
}
|p=true
|output=
▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀
▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀
▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀
▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀
}}
